definition: عضد ‘aḍada u (‘aḍd) to help, aid, assist, support, back (هـ, ه s.o., s.th.), stand up (ه for s.o.), advocate (هـ s.th.) II and 618 III = I; VI to help, assist, or support one another, give mutual help, assistance, or support; to work hand in hand, cooperate عضد ‘aḍud help, aid, assistance, support, backing; helper, aide, assistant, supporter, backer عضد ‘aḍud (m. and f.) pl. اعضاد a‘ḍād upper arm; strength, power, vigor, force │ شد عضده (‘aḍudahū) to aid, assist s.o., stand by s.o.; هو عضده المتين he is an indispensable aid to him
